comments.text:
@picassolibs one of the most enthusiastic motoring journalists to come 
along in a long time, and he's been a writer for car magazines such as 
Autocar and Evo for many years. He's a brilliant driver, and the way he 
communicates with the viewers about the experiences he has whilst driving 
is second to none. A proper petrolhead journalist.
